title: Professional Ethics and Conduct
description: Introduction to professional ethics and conduct in the IT industry

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of professional ethics in IT?

options.text: To guide behavior and decision-making in professional practice
To comply with legal requirements only

questions.explanation: Professional ethics in IT serves as a framework to guide behavior and decision-making in professional practice. While technical excellence and legal compliance are important, ethics goes beyond these aspects to ensure moral responsibility, trust, and the protection of stakeholders' interests. It helps professionals make decisions that balance various concerns including technical, social, and moral implications.
